name: The Thing That Follows
description:
The Thing That Follows places players in a classic game of tag with a twist, the “tagged” player is being chased by a mysterious monster.

This was a small game created by myself and a team of two others in 2019 for a university game jam; the game was my first attempt at programming networking and a very successful one considering my lack of knowledge.  The creation of this game allowed me to feel what it was like working in a team first-hand and allowed me to spearhead the project's production personally.
